test-case.name: searchAmediaInGoogle
test-case.description: Navigate to google.com and search with ABC Tech keyword.

step.name: type[By.id: lst-ib, amedia]
step.title: Type in object [By.id: lst-ib] with value : amedia

label.name: story
label.value: BT-0002 : Search working properly with Amedia
